me.jacklin213.lincore
Class LocalConfigHandler

java.lang.Object
  me.jacklin213.lincore.LocalConfigHandler

public class LocalConfigHandler
extends Object

LocalConfigHandler is a class which handles basic configuration. If addition methods need to be added make a local class which extends to this class.

Author:
jacklin213

 void assignVariableStrings()

LocalConfigHandler

public LocalConfigHandler(Plugin instance,
                          Logger logger,
                          DataStorage dataStorage)
LocalConfigHandler constructor for LinPlugin series. Runs the setup method

Parameters:
instance - The LinPlugin to be hooked to.
logger - Plugin logger (getLogger() from main class)
dataStorage - DataStorage instance to set and retrieve data from
Method Detail

createConfig

public void createConfig()
Creates a config which is copied from the default config.yml, will cause and NPE if there is no default config

Reloads the config and logs message to console

setup

public void setup()
Sets up the ConfigHandler for specified LinPlugin from the LocalConfigHandler constructor Runs the register, setPluginFolder, setConfigLogger, createConfig methods.
